snippet: Positive train control, which can automatically slow trains, had not yet been installed on a critical stretch of track in Philadelphia where Train 188 derailed on Tuesday night.
abstract: Technology that may have prevented deadly derailment of Amtrak train has been invented but has yet to be installed on critical stretch of track near Philadelphia; Congress mandated that technology, called positive train control, be installed throughout nation's rail system by 2015 following deadly crash in California in 2008, but meeting goal has proved challenging.
lead_paragraph: Positive train control, which can automatically slow trains, had not yet been installed on a critical stretch of track in Philadelphia where Train 188 derailed on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Technology That Could Have Prevented Amtrak Derailment Was Absent
headline.print_headline: Technology That Could Have Prevented Derailment Has Not Yet Been Installed
